## MintNFTParams type

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The params for the [useMintNFT()](./react.usemintnft.md) hook mutation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MintNFTParams<TContract extends NFTContract> = TContract extends Erc1155 ? {
    metadata: NFTMetadataOrUri;
    supply: BigNumberish;
    to: WalletAddress;
} : {
    metadata: NFTMetadataOrUri;
    to: WalletAddress;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [NFTContract](./react.nftcontract.md)<!-- -->, [WalletAddress](./react.walletaddress.md)
